company_products.query: EVALUATE TOPN(15000, SUMMARIZECOLUMNS( 'CompanyProducts'[ID], 'CompanyProducts'[Description], 'CompanyProducts'[Brand], 'CompanyProducts'[Category], 'CompanyProducts'[Withdrawn_from_range], 'CompanyProducts'[item_number], "Product_Properties", VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE('УТ_Номенклатура'[Артикул], "No Product Selected") RETURN CONCATENATEX( TOPN( 1000, FILTER( 'Char_table', [Артикул] = CurrentProduct ), [SortOrder] ), [_description] & ": " & [Значение], " | ", [SortOrder] ) ), 'CompanyProducts'[ID] )
